g.text: Create rich code images for your docs.
Glob patterns to search for rich-codex comments
Glob patterns to exclude from search for rich-codex comments
Set to disable searching for rich-codex comments
Specify a command to run to capture output
Language to use for snippet sytax highlighting
Path to image filenames if using 'command' or 'snippet'
Remove any matching files that are not generated
Set to skip confirmation prompt before running commands
Minimum file percentage change required to update image
Skip image update if file changes match regex
Use a pseudo-terminal for commands (may capture coloured output)
Print verbose output to the console.
Save a verbose log to a file (automatic filename).
Save a verbose log to a file (specific filename).
